title: Nuveen Quality Municipal Income Fund (NAD) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen Quality Municipal Income Fund ( NAD  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.054 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased NAD prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 13th quarter that NAD has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $14.5, the dividend yield is 4.47%.
The previous trading day's last sale of NAD was $14.5, representing a -1.16% decrease from the 52 week high of $14.67 and a 18.46% increase over the 52 week low of $12.24.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the NAD Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.

Interested in gaining exposure to NAD through an Exchange Traded Fund [ETF]?   The following ETF(s) have NAD as a top-10 holding:  VanEck Vectors CEF Municipal Income ETF (   XMPT    ) First Trust Municipal CEF Income Opportunity ETF (   MCEF    ).
The top-performing ETF of this group is MCEF with an increase of 7.17% over the last 100 days. XMPT has the highest percent weighting of NAD at 8.1%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
